data.sentence: The word أَحَدٌ comes from the root ا ح د and is associated with the meanings: make/call it one, unity, anyone/anything.ahada ashara (eleven).

data.meanings: chastisement, castigate, punishment, torture, torment, retribution, abstain/desist, relinquish, quit.adhb - sweet (usually water), e.g. 25:53, 35:12.

data.meanings: day, era, time, today, this/that day, age/period of time.
data.sentence: The word فَيَوْمَئِذٍ comes from the root ي و م and is associated with the meanings: day, era, time, today, this/that day, age/period of time.
